revised_title: The Dangers of Swallowing Bullace and Sloe Stones
tldr: This article shares a case study of a man who experienced severe stomach pains and vomiting after swallowing numerous stones from bullace and sloe fruits. The man had consumed large amounts of these fruits in his youth, and the stones remained in his stomach for years before causing health issues. The author, William Derham, presents this case to warn others about the potential dangers of swallowing fruit stones.
